cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.model

Class Geolocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w15t07.TravelTracker.model.Geolocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Geolocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A serializable alternative to Android's LatLng class. Immutable so that the containing Document will always be alerted to changes.
    Author:
    colp, therabidsquirel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • distanceBetween

        public double distanceBetween(Geolocation other)
        Taken on April 4, 2015 from: (http://stackoverflow.com/a/123305) Get the distance in kilometers between this geolocation and the provided geolocation. Uses the Haversine formula.
        Parameters:
        other - The geolocation to calculate the distance to.
        Returns:
        The distance between this and other in kilometers.
